package my.com.sapura.ngos.controller.application.${moduleNameLowerCase};

import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import my.com.sapura.ngos.common.model.${moduleNameLowerCase}.${modelNamePascalCase};
import my.com.sapura.ngos.controller.BaseController;
import my.com.sapura.ngos.orm.entity.${moduleNameLowerCase}.${entityNamePascalCase};
import my.com.sapura.ngos.service.application.${moduleNameLowerCase}.${serviceSOPascalCase};
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

@Slf4j
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/${routePathLowerCase}")
public class ${controllerNamePascalCase} extends BaseController<${entityNamePascalCase}, ${modelNamePascalCase}, Long> {

    private final ${serviceSOPascalCase} ${serviceSOCamelCase};

    public ${controllerNamePascalCase}(${serviceSOPascalCase} service) {
        super(service);
        this.${serviceSOCamelCase} = service;
    }

}
